column5: sorry about the nf post but i am a bit crunched for time. i need to renew my fac and need a passport photo.  does anyone know of a place that does this in the hamilton burlington area same day.  thanks  d
Call CAA on Centennial Pkwy. I know they do it. Not sure if it's same day.
I get all mine done at Wal-Mart...usually takes ten to twenty minutes.  Think last year it cost me around $14.00

D, unfortunately, we're located in North York at Yonge & Finch! We do passports in 5-10 mins. If there are any other OFC members who are in our area and need a passport, please mention the site and we'll give you a special price! It has been absolutely crazy with all the new regs. Thanks, Dave
Remember Dave (dwc)...no white shirt...no glasses and oh yah...you have to take your ear rings out..... LOL

a tripod and digi cam and make ur own, did mine and some for friends and family, as long as u follow the guidlines  they'll accept it, when i first applied years ago i used a photo booth at the local mall, got 4 pics for a toonie and that one was also accepted

Did my own with my inkjet printer and digital camera.  The fine print says Passport quality photo.  With the proper sizing and following the instructions should be good to go.  In fact I'm waiting for my refusal I mean approval soon.
I did my own for my firearms possession license.

You do not need to get a passport photo at all.  A digital camera is fine have a white background and make sure the pic is the size that they require on the application. We generally take photos of our students when they complete their PAL course and send it in with their apps.  We have not had an application retiurned.  Hope this is of help.  Regards, Sam
CAA does your passport photos for free if you are a member...  Justin
